REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1734 reute d f BC-HADRON-<HDRN.O>-GETS 06-02 0043

TEXT.TITLE: HADRON <HDRN.O> GETS CUSTOMS SERVICE CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Hadron Inc said it has received a three-year one mln dlr contract from the U.S. Customs Service to provide technical and managerial support to Customs' research and development division. Reuter
